General.Name: Fortune Mate Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Fortune Mate Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides real estate development and construction services primarily in Indonesia. Its project portfolio includes land, residential, office, and industrial properties. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

6.Name: Ms. Winasis Indriati Weliamto
6.Title: Head of the Internal Audit Unit
